title: Rust Multithreaded Server Development
description: In this lab, we will be transforming our single-threaded server into a multithreaded server to improve its efficiency in processing multiple requests simultaneously.

meta.title: Turning Our Single-Threaded Server Into a Multithreaded Server
meta.description: Learn how to transform a single-threaded server into a more efficient multithreaded server to handle multiple requests simultaneously.
meta.keywords: rust playground, multithreaded server, rust online ide, rust tutor, rust online compiler, performance optimization, rust commands, rust practice, rust online, rust online playground
